## Featured projects
A selection of my recent work.

::: {.project-grid}

::: {.project-card}
![](../assets/projects/warehouse.png){.card-img}

**Warehouse optimization**  
Solving MIP problems for storage optimization.

MIP models for slotting, picking, and replenishment, with KPI tracking and result exports.

**Technologies:** Python · PuLP / Gurobi · NetworkX · Plotly
:::

::: {.project-card}
![](../assets/projects/energy.png){.card-img}

**Energy forecasting**  
Energy demand prediction using statistical and machine learning models.

Demand forecasting using sliding-window approaches with TCN/RNN and SARIMAX models, evaluated with MAE, RMSE, and MAPE metrics, along with performance monitoring mechanisms.

**Technologies:** Python · TensorFlow · Pandas · ML lifecycle tools · R · Prophet · Statsmodels · Forecasting
:::

::: {.project-card}
![](../assets/projects/bi.png){.card-img}

**Data integration & BI**  
ETL pipelines feeding Power BI dashboards.

Processing pipelines from multiple data sources (SQL Server, Excel, APIs) into Power BI, including data quality checks and DAX measures.

**Technologies:** Azure Databricks · SQL · Power BI · ETL / ELT · Data quality monitoring · DAX
:::

[Learn more →](../fr/projects/index.qmd)
